title: Sausage Stuffed Bacon Wrapped Dates
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line baking sheet with foil.
Brown italian sausage in a pan, break into pieces and cook until no pink remains. Let cool slightly.

Cut the side open of each date and stuff with sausage. Wrap with half a piece of bacon, tucking the ends underneath to help keep it secure when cooking. Place on baking sheet and repeat with all dates.
Bake for 30-35 minutes or until bacon is crispy (the time will range depending on the thickness of the bacon).
Pour just a little bit of hot sauce on top of each date and serve with a toothipick dead in the center!
ingredients: Â½ pound ground hot italian sausage
